ComicInfo.Summary:
The final issue of Elizabeth Bathory comes to a head when Elizabeth attains the throne as the destroyer of the Dark Lord and is crowned the Countess of Blood. One by one, readers are discovering the power behind creator Raulo’s mystic dream of an evil woman in touch with her dark side. This is not an erotic series that is typical of Eros Comix. Yes there is much explicit sex in this series, but the sex is not used to titillate the reader but rather to tell the story of a demoness from Hell and her wants, needs and motivations and how she became a goddess of terror. If you’re looking for a great story, do yourself a favor and pick up a copy ofElizabeth Bathory. Warning! This comic contains much blood and violence and is not for the faint of heart.
